card_text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters$NGains 500 ATK/DEF for each card in your hand. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ravenous Crocodragon Archethys" once per turn.$N●If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can draw cards equal to the number of non-Tuners used for its Synchro Summon.$N●(Quick Effect): You can discard 2 cards, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it.
